game_description: Reject humanity, become skwurl. Jump around, play different minigames, and just have fun. Hang out in the Nest, or stay on the top of the map, you do you.
review_1: Gorilla Tag is completely free on standalone quest and pretty much everyone owns it anyway, if you really want to have the locomotion just play Gorilla tag. I get that not everyone wants to be surrounded by racist 7 year olds on their brothers VR, but thatâ€™s why lobbies locked with codes exist, just play it with a close friend group.
review_2: It's all my fault about the backrooms and the stuff please add the old map back please I loved your game so much I played it every single day I love your game please and I mean please give us our old map back please
review_3: PLEASE CONTINUE MAKING THE GAME WHY WOULD YOU STOP
review_5: wow, played this with my friend yesterday and I can proudly say, this might be the best gorilla tag fan game. so much to explore and great fun.
